issue.title: www.vanillaprepaid.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.vanillaprepaid.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vanillaprepaid.com%2F) ### Comment > If I visit the site with Adguard enabled, it will show an error message before I even put any card details in. With Adguard still enabled AND correct card details entered, it still shows an error message. > > When adguard is off and the correct card details are entered, the error message goes away and the site works properly. ### Screenshots

issue.title: news.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://news.google.com/articles/CBMibGh0dHBzOi8vd3d3Lm5iY25ld3MuY29tL25ld3MvdXMtbmV3cy9mYWxsb3V0LXN1c3BlY3RlZC1zcHktYmFsbG9vbi1raWxscy1odWdlLXByb3BhZ2FuZGEtd2luLWNoaW5hLXJjbmE2OTE1N9IBKmh0dHBzOi8vd3d3Lm5iY25ld3MuY29tL25ld3MvYW1wL3JjbmE2OTE1Nw?hl=en-US&gl=US&ceid=US%3Aen](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.google.com%2Farticles%2FCBMibGh0dHBzOi8vd3d3Lm5iY25ld3MuY29tL25ld3MvdXMtbmV3cy9mYWxsb3V0LXN1c3BlY3RlZC1zcHktYmFsbG9vbi1raWxscy1odWdlLXByb3BhZ2FuZGEtd2luLWNoaW5hLXJjbmE2OTE1N9IBKmh0dHBzOi8vd3d3Lm5iY25ld3MuY29tL25ld3MvYW1wL3JjbmE2OTE1Nw%3Fhl%3Den-US%26gl%3DUS%26ceid%3DUS%253Aen) ### Comment > "View in app" nonsense at the bottom of the page. I can easily reproduce this by going to news.google.com and clicking on any NBC News article; it doesn't happen if I go to an article through nbcnews.com directly. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/7MDLBVu.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.9.1.1217 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Userscripts: | disabled

comment.body: My mistake, this is for Adguard Android, not Mac OS.

issue.title: id.quora.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://id.quora.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fid.quora.com%2F) ### Comment > Normally you can remove dismiss the “Buka di Aplikasi” bottom banner by pressing X. Pressing X would do two visually noticeable action, it would remove the blue banner and it’d also move down the content feedback banner to the bottom of the viewable screen area so it would obstruct the content less. > > With AdGuard enabled, it removed the blue banner but it doesn’t move down the content feedback banner to the bottom thus it partially obstructs the content. > > This issue also happened on the Quora English site “quora.com”. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/6AogcKT.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Dw3X2kQ.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.5 Browser: | Safari DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

issue.title: classroom.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://classroom.google.com/c/NTQ5NjQxOTY4NjUx](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclassroom.google.com%2Fc%2FNTQ5NjQxOTY4NjUx) ### Comment > Здравствуйте. В Google Класс блокируется очень важный элемент, без которого сложно работать. > > Если отключить защиту на сайте Google Класс, то нужный элемент появляется. И если запланировать в Google Класс более 2 занятий и поставить таймер на автоматическую публикацию по времени, то на втором занятии список сворачивается и показывается, только последние две даты, а то, что было раньше скрыто под спойлером. Суть в том, что когда защита включена, то AdGuard удаляет кнопку, которая позволяет раскрыть спойлер и взаимодействовать со всем списком запланированных занятий. Таким образом, невозможно планировать более 2-х занятий, так как до остальных не добраться, без кнопки раскрытия спойлера. Если отключить защиту, то кнопка появляется. На скриншотах хорошо все видно... ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/qGCbJDX.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/BWD7DzM.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.11.3 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Other extensions used: | Имеется только ESET Internet Security, но при отключении AdGuard на сайте Google Класс проблемы прекращаются

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.nintendo.co.kr/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nintendo.co.kr%2F) ### Comment Username: @dora-0 > That site is not accessible while using AdGuard.
